thread.title: On suspending reinsurance licence (Central Bank of Russia)
thread.title_full: On suspending reinsurance licence (Central Bank of Russia) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: On suspending reinsurance licence (Central Bank of Russia)
text: (Source: Central Bank of Russia) By its Order No. OD-2703, dated 7 October 2015, the Bank of Russia suspended the reinsurance licence of the Russian Forest Industry Reinsurance Company, limited liability company (registration number in the unified state register of insurance agents is 3087). The decision is taken due to the insurer's failure to timely execute a Bank of Russia instruction, namely, due to its non-compliance with financial sustainability and solvency requirements with respect to securing insurance reserves, procedure and conditions to invest capital and insurance reserve funds. The decision becomes effective the day it is published in the Bank of Russia Bulletin. Suspended licence shall mean a prohibition on entering into new insurance contracts and also on amending respective contracts resulting in increase in the existing obligations. The insurance agent shall accept applications on the occurrence of insured events and perform obligations. distributed by This content was issued by Central Bank of Russia on the 2015-10-07 and was initially posted on www.cbr.ru. It was distributed, unedited and unaltered, by noodls on 2015-10-08 10:09:11 UTC. The original issuer is solely responsible for the accuracy of the information contained therein. (noodl: 30235420)
